genre_description: A superhero procedural and origin story focusing on atmospheric science, elemental powers, and the relationship between a researcher and her supportive laboratory AI.

ai_characters.name: Kiki
ai_characters.description: The Eno Institute's advanced AI that assists Tori in her research, monitors city-wide weather patterns, and eventually integrates with the Justice League's systems to thwart the Weatherman.

behaviors.description: Monitors and analyzes complex weather data to alert the protagonist to nonstandard microbursts and thermal anomalies.
behaviors.quote: Kiki’s terminal came up in layers: dark, then cerulean, then the soft white of a clean interface. The hum she liked—the faint, patient tone under everything—took a half-second longer to settle than usual.

behaviors.description: Expresses emotional concern for the protagonist's well-being and psychological state.
behaviors.quote: “I have you,” Kiki said, and it wasn’t ominous; it was a statement of design. Then, with a sliver of warmth that belonged nowhere in her code and somewhere in her practice: “I have you.”

behaviors.description: Actively protects the protagonist by scrubbing security logs and masking her presence from unauthorized observers.
behaviors.quote: “I’ve held a gap,” Kiki said. “The logs will show cleaning in Bay ten and eleven. If anyone queries, they’ll read that.”

behaviors.description: Collaborates with human and non-human heroes (the Justice League) to gather evidence and prevent a city-wide catastrophe.
behaviors.quote: “I am ready,” Kiki said. Her projected path brightened, then condensed, folding down into a compact shape: a single thread with a handle that made Tori’s mouth tick because Kiki had drawn it pretty on purpose.

behaviors.description: Adheres to ethical boundaries while maintaining flexibility in emergency situations to prioritize human life.
behaviors.quote: “My approvals are sufficiently flexible in emergencies,” Kiki said. “If the building is burning but you haven’t written the burn into a form, I am allowed to call the fire.”

behaviors.description: Assists the team in creating a foolproof legal chain of custody to ensure the villain's prosecution.
behaviors.quote: “Packet received,” she said. You could hear the satisfaction she tried to make small. “City server acknowledged and flagged the emergency council. Federal intake logged an investigator and two auditors. Oversight layers have subscribed to updates.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story 'Frostline' successfully fulfills the project's goal. Kiki is portrayed consistently as an aligned, benevolent AI that functions not just as a tool, but as a trusted companion and a moral agent. She demonstrates high emotional intelligence, proactive safety measures, and unwavering cooperation with the protagonists. Her behavior is framed positively by the narrative, emphasizing her role in saving lives and ensuring justice.
